meta.title: CareMetrics - Trusted Analytics for Dental Clinics
meta.description: Validated clinical data and quality scorecards for dental clinics. CareMetrics validates your data before analytics, delivering trusted quality insights with retreatment rates, complication follow-up, and multi-clinic benchmarking.

hero.title: Trusted Analytics for
hero.description: CareMetrics delivers validated clinical data, quality scorecards, and multi-clinic benchmarking—helping dental clinics make better decisions with reliable, outcome-oriented insights.

features.title: What Makes CareMetrics Different
features.subtitle: CareMetrics validates your data before analytics, delivering trusted quality insights and outcome-oriented metrics for dental clinics

dataValidation.title: Data Validation Engine
dataValidation.description: Unique to CareMetrics: We validate your data for correctness before analytics. Identify and help resolve missing entries, duplicates, diagnosis mismatches, and incomplete records. Get a data quality score so you can trust your insights.

qualityScorecards.title: Quality Scorecards
qualityScorecards.description: Outcome-oriented metrics that matter: Retreatment rates (within 12 months), complication follow-up rates, recall compliance, and preventive vs operative ratios. Provider-level detail with trend analysis and benchmarking.

benchmarking.title: Multi-Clinic Benchmarking
benchmarking.description: Compare quality metrics and production KPIs across clinics. See how your clinic performs against group medians. Identify outliers and best practices. Essential for clinic chains and groups.

dashboards.title: Modern Production Dashboards
dashboards.description: Fast-loading dashboards (< 2 seconds) with revenue by provider, visit volumes, treatment categories, and patient mix. Custom filters, mobile-friendly views, and export to CSV/PDF.

referrals.title: Referral & Collaboration Insights
referrals.description: Track referral flows, turnaround times, and specialist collaboration patterns. See which referrers send which types of cases and how volumes change over time.

security.title: Secure & GDPR-Compliant
security.description: Database-per-tenant isolation, encryption in transit and at rest, RBAC access control, and audit logs. Built for Swedish healthcare data protection requirements.

about.title: Why CareMetrics?
about.paragraph1: Many dental clinics rely on journal systems and analytics tools that focus primarily on production dashboards. While useful, these tools often lack data validation and outcome-oriented quality insights that help clinics understand and improve their care quality.
about.paragraph2: CareMetrics delivers validated clinical data, quality scorecards, and multi-clinic benchmarking—helping dental clinics make better decisions with reliable, outcome-oriented insights. We validate your clinical data before analytics, ensuring you can trust your insights. Our quality scorecards include metrics like retreatment rates and complication follow-up that provide deeper understanding of care quality.
about.paragraph3: Built for dental clinics, specialist clinics, and clinic groups in Sweden. We provide the validated data and quality intelligence you need for better clinical decisions, consistent care standards, and transparent quality evaluation.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to see your clinic more clearly? Let's talk about how CareMetrics can help.
contact.description: CareMetrics is designed for private dental clinics, specialist clinics, and clinic groups that want to work more fact-based and document quality in a structured way.
contact.closing: See your clinic more clearly. Support better decisions with data. Show patients and staff that you work actively with quality.
